info.name: DataPilot API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for DataPilot backend endpoints with REST-compliant structure, LangGraph-based conversation management, and comprehensive Salesforce integration. Includes DataPilot AI Agent, SObject cache management, conversation analytics, and full CRUD operations for all resources.

body.raw:
{
  "connection_uuid": "{{connectionUuid}}",
  "name": "My Saved Query",
  "query_text": "SELECT Id, Name FROM Account LIMIT 10",
  "description": "Query to get account names",
  "tags": "accounts,test",
  "is_favorite": false,
  "created_by": "user"
}

query.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return
Optional - creates new if not provided

request.description: WebSocket endpoint for real-time chat with DataPilot AI Agent. Creates new conversation automatically with LangGraph persistence.

query.description: Continue existing conversation with LangGraph state

request.description: WebSocket endpoint for real-time chat with existing conversation context using LangGraph persistence.

body.raw:
{
  "connection_uuid": "{{connectionUuid}}",
  "agent_name": "datapilot-agent",
  "title": "My Conversation",
  "description": "Conversation about Salesforce data analysis",
  "tags": "salesforce,analysis",
  "initial_message": "Hello, I need help with Salesforce queries",
  "created_by": "user"
}
